author: Andy Baehr
title: Home on the (BTC) Range
description: Is a range-bound bitcoin price a good or bad thing?
content:
Hi. Im Andy Baehr with the CoinDesk Indices team. 
Question: Bitcoin is stuck in a range. Is that a bad thing or a good thing?
